This movie is so awful\,I can't even remember a single redeeming scheme\,that wasn't completely ruined\,by a previous scene.So\,Rey apparently is the Greatest Force User in Star Wars History\,so there's apparently no point in watching any previous Star Wars anything\,because she trumps them all.Oh\,and Luke Skywalker dreams of killing kids now!
